name: Moontato
description:
Team Moonshiners present

The potato moon has decayed and left a seed that you now have to grow into a new moon! Become a humble farmer who has to restore nature's balance in this relaxing farming adventure.

Requirenments: Currently, the game is only tested using an xbox 360 controller. 

This is a project made by three university students. Team Moonshiners consist of:

Torben Borghoff, Nick Alves, Darya Grinait
